        Parameters:
        date - if it has a length of ten, it mut have numbers in the position (0,1,3,4,6,7,8,9) pre CURRENT_YEAR !=Null pre CURRENT_MONTH !=Null pre CURRENT_DAY !=Null
        Returns:
        valid.
